snippet: Paris Fashion Week ended with a grand party on a stairwell. Or at least that’s what it looked like walking into the Louvre for the opening of an exhibition on Louis Vuitton and Marc Jacobs.
abstract: Paris Fashion Week ended with a grand party on a stairwell. Or at least that’s what it looked like walking into the Louvre for the opening of an exhibition on Louis Vuitton and Marc Jacobs.

headline.kicker: On the Runway Blog | Fast Fashion
